title: How to quote a design project (workshop)
content:
Hi

I'm planning on doing a workshop about this subject on my university. If you have any interesting information I would love to know. A friend recently shared some info about an Alliance of German Designers workshop:

------------------------------------------------------------------------  
price per hour x hour = working price  
------------------------------------------------------------------------  
Usage type simple 0.2  
Usage type exclusve 1.0  
------------------------------------------------------------------------  
Usage area national 0.1  
Usage area regional 0.3  
Usage area Europe 1.0  
Usage area Europe 1.5  
Usage area worldwide 2.5  
------------------------------------------------------------------------  
Usage time 1 year 0.1  
Usage time 5 years 0.3  
Usage time 10 years 0.5  
Usage time forever 1.5  
------------------------------------------------------------------------  
usage extent small 0.1 (small print number under 500)  
usage extent medium 0.3 (medium print number 500-5.000 copies)  
usage extent big 0.7 (big print number above 5.000 -10.000 etc..)  
usage extent seriously everywhere 1.0 (big print and or online)  
------------------------------------------------------------------------  
Total Factor = X.X  
------------------------------------------------------------------------  
working price x X.X = final price  
------------------------------------------------------------------------

So, if you have some interesting information or some advice on this subject, I will be most grateful.
author: ferfolio_2

comments.content:
\> small print number under 500

Your list seems more like something used by an artist or commercial illustrator rather than a graphic designer. A designer would typically list their hours by categories — consultation time (meetings, emails, phone calls), research, concept development, final art, revisions (with some clients, revisions may be a significant percentage of the total amount), etc — and would list reimbursable expenses by category —photography, illustration, proofs, printing, etc.
